Subject: Sequels and Series in Genre Fiction
Description: We all love that feeling we get when we can fully immerse ourselves in a fictional world.  Conversely, the return to the real world can be quite shocking.  Is this part of the reason for the prevalence of series work in genre fiction?  Is it something from the publishing side?  Is there a place for the stand alone work in SFF?  Speakers include:Mary Lynne Gibbs, Michael Cieslak - Track: Lit  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Webseries and Fan Films: Future of Filmmaking?
Description: Come join us for a discussion on making webseries and fan films.  Speakers include:Keith Martens, Mary Lynne Gibbs, James Fernandez - Track: Film  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Ask the Authors
Description: A small panel followed by open Q&A/Suggestions.  Speakers include:Ernie Cline, Mary Lynne Gibbs, Cory Doctorow, John Scalzi    - Track: Lit  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Obligatory Undead Panel: Is Undead Dead
Description: Shoot ‘em in the head, stake ‘em through the heart, the good old silver bullet...it doesn’t matter, the undead keep coming back.  Have zombies, vampires, and werewolves finally run their course or do these creatures still have legs?  Is there a division between genre fans who have grown tired of these creatures just as they’re taking off in the general public?  Speakers include:Mary Lynne Gibbs, Michael Cieslak, Sean M. Davis, Ken MacGreggor - Track: Lit  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: The Importance of Editing and Non-Writing For Would-Be Writers
Description:
Editing is an important part of creating a book, even if it isn't as sexy as, you know, actually writing.  We'll be discussing editing, query letters, and all of the business crap that comes along with doing this for a living.  Speakers include:
Mary Lynne Gibbs, Michael Cieslak, Rosemary Van Deuren - Track: Lit  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Author Readings
Description: Readings by Literature Track Guests and Panelists  Speakers include:Ken MacGreggor, Mary Lynne Gibbs, Nicole Castle, John Scalzi, Sean Davis - Track: Lit  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
